subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The most hallowed Ivy League career football record — 4,715 yards rushing by Ed Marinaro of Cornell — still stands after 35 years.  But Harvard's Clifton Dawson is on the verge of history.
snippet: The most hallowed Ivy League career football record — 4,715 yards rushing by Ed Marinaro of Cornell — still stands after 35 years.  But Harvard's Clifton Dawson is on the verge of history.
